<!-- ─── Experience ───────────────────────────────────────────── -->
<div class="section-block container-xl">

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

experiences = p["experiences"]

print('<h2 class="section-heading">Experience</h2>')
print('<div class="timeline">')

for exp in experiences:
    role     = html.escape(exp["role"])
    company  = html.escape(exp["company"])
    time_    = html.escape(exp["time"])
    location = html.escape(exp.get("location", ""))
    details  = exp.get("details", [])

    loc_html = f'<span class="tl-loc"> · {location}</span>' if location else ""

    details_html = ""
    if details:
        items = "\n".join(f'<li>{html.escape(d)}</li>' for d in details)
        details_html = f'<ul class="tl-details">{items}</ul>'

    print(f"""
<div class="timeline-item">
  <div class="tl-dot"></div>
  <div>
    <div class="tl-header">
      <h3 class="tl-role">{role}</h3>
      <span class="tl-time">{time_}</span>
    </div>
    <p class="tl-company">{company}{loc_html}</p>
    {details_html}
  </div>
</div>
""")

print('</div>')
```

</div>

<!-- ─── Skills & Certifications ──────────────────────────────── -->
<div class="section-block section-block--alt">
<div class="container-xl">
<div class="two-col-grid" style="display:grid; grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr; gap:3rem; align-items:start;">

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

skills = p["skills"]
certs  = p["certifications"]

# ── Skills ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────
print('<div>')
print('<h2 class="section-heading">Skills</h2>')
for group in skills:
    cat   = html.escape(group["category"])
    tags  = "".join(f'<span class="tag-pill">{html.escape(item)}</span>' for item in group["items"])
    print(f'<div class="skill-group"><p class="skill-cat">{cat}</p><div class="skill-tags">{tags}</div></div>')
print('</div>')

# ── Certifications ───────────────────────────────────────────────
print('<div>')
print('<h2 class="section-heading">Certifications</h2>')
for cert in certs:
    name   = html.escape(cert["name"])
    issuer = html.escape(cert["issuer"])
    date   = html.escape(str(cert["date"]))
    print(f'''<div class="cert-item">
  <span class="cert-name">{name}</span>
  <span class="cert-meta">{issuer} · {date}</span>
</div>''')
print('</div>')
```

</div>
